name: Shoot Bubble 2
description:
Welcome to this exciting bubble world and enjoy the fun of cool bubble shooting!
Shooter Bubble 2 is an addictive bubble match-3 game, offline and fun, with thousands of fun and challenging puzzle levels! Get ready to aim, shoot and blast all the bubbles along the way!

Show off your bubble shooting skills in Shooter Bubble!
Choose the bubble, and launch the bubble! Match colors, shoot bubbles, solve puzzles, enjoy and relax! If you can't distinguish the color, then look for the same pattern to match! Train your brain and kill boredom!


Features of Shooter Bubble:
- Once you shoot, you don't want to stop! The bubble shooter game is simple but addictive!
- Accept the challenge, click and shoot! Pop bubbles! Break through the bubble wall and enjoy endless shooting!
- Thousands of great levels! Shooter Bubble 2 is the most classic bubble shooting game! Can train your brain!
- Well-designed and wonderful effects! Perfect to enjoy and relax this fun bubble game in a fantastic bubble world!
- No wireless network! No internet! Pop up on the go! Enjoy offline bubble shooting anytime, anywhere!
- There are new cloud bubbles, fantastic boosters, fireballs and cool special elements!

How to play shooter bubble blasting bubble game?
- Enter any challenge level and switch the colorful bubbles you need!
- Swipe your finger to find the right angle, release to shoot! Or aim carefully and click to shoot bubbles of the same color!
- Match 3 or more bubbles and make all bubbles explode! Find the most efficient way to clear the level!
- Complete levels to unlock new achievement missions and get extra bubble shooter rewards!
